mapper.insert: insert into user (id, username, password, phone, usertype, fullname, sex, birthday, height, introduction, address, education, marrige, salary, balance, trueness, profession, albumid, standardid, vip_enddate, date_status ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usertype,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{fullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{height,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{marrige,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{salary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{balance,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{trueness,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{profession,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{albumid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{standardid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vipEnddate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{dateStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT} )
mapper.update: update user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, usertype = #{usertype,jdbcType=TINYINT}, fullname = #{fullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, height = #{height,jdbcType=INTEGER}, introduction = #{introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, education = #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, marrige = #{marrige,jdbcType=TINYINT}, salary = #{salary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, balance = #{balance,jdbcType=INTEGER}, trueness = #{trueness,jdbcType=INTEGER}, profession = #{profession,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, albumid = #{albumid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, standardid = #{standardid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, vip_enddate = #{vipEnddate,jdbcType=DATE}, date_status = #{dateStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, username, password, phone, usertype, fullname, sex, birthday, height, introduction, address, education, marrige, salary, balance, trueness, profession, albumid, standardid, vip_enddate, date_status from user where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, username, password, phone, usertype, fullname, sex, birthday, height, introduction, address, education, marrige, salary, balance, trueness, profession, albumid, standardid, vip_enddate, date_status from user

select id, username, password, phone, usertype, fullname, sex, birthday, height, introduction, address, education, marrige, salary, balance, trueness, profession, albumid, standardid, vip_enddate, date_status from user where username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select id, username, password, phone, usertype, fullname, sex, birthday, height, introduction, address, education, marrige, salary, balance, trueness, profession, albumid, standardid, vip_enddate, date_status from user where phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
